Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Convert an image from JPG to PNG
Top-3 Scripts:
so_35941693: #!/bin/bash
shopt -s nullglob

cd  /opt/ADL_db/Users/mkhalil/OpenCV/positive

for f in *.png *.jpg *.jpeg; do
   read w h < <(convert "$f" -format "%w %h" info:)
   echo $f, $w, $h
done

convert /opt/ADL_db/Users/mkhalil/OpenCV/positive/*.{jpg,png,jpeg} -format "%f %w %h\n" info:

Explanations about Options.-w(M):
Do not automatically hard-wrap the current line when it becomes overlong. This is
 the default. (This option is the opposite of -b (--breaklonglines) - the last one
 given takes effect.)
